PAD_Comment.synopsis: This VB plays when players first see the results of a druid ritual: indestructible vines have enveloped the entire grove, sealing it off from the outside world. Players cannot get past them to the grove within.

PAD_Attack.synopsis: This VB plays when players attack the indestructible vines that have enveloped a druid's grove.

PAD_Comment_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Comment_0.text: Looks like the ritual worked. The whole grove is walled in.
PAD_Comment_0.context: NodeContext: Karlach: Sad. tieflings trapped inside.

PAD_Attack_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Attack_0.text: It'd take an age to hack through all this.
